attributes.action: Allow 16 year olds to vote in general elections and any upcoming referendums
attributes.additional_details: For example, we didn't have a say in whether or not the UK remains in the EU and this is something that has a huge impact on our generation and we should also be in control of our future
attributes.background: I believe that it's only fair if those under 18 get a chance to vote as these events would massively affect our lives
